details.title: Brittle-Plastic theory and identification of material properties for elastoplasticstructure
details.abstract: The paper is concerned with brittle-plastic problems. A formulation of damage surface perturbation is proposed. The regularized least-square methods for solving the inverse probl ems of elastoplastic rock-structures have been proposed. The techniques have been applied to some specific examples which give the evidence that the method is satisfactory and effici ent.
